pqr.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
pqr.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions

age.question: What is the minimum age to enter?
age.answer: The minimum age to enter the event is 18 years old. You must present an original and valid ID at the entrance.

time.question: What time does the event open?
time.answer: Doors open at 8:00 PM. We recommend arriving early to avoid lines and enjoy the full experience from the beginning.

reentry.question: Can I leave and re-enter?
reentry.answer: Re-entry to the event is not allowed due to security policies. Once you leave the venue, you will not be able to re-enter.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PSE, and cash at authorized points of sale. Online payments are processed securely.

refund.question: Can I request a refund for my ticket?
refund.answer: Tickets are non-refundable. Only in case of event cancellation will a 100% refund of the amount paid be made.

parking.question: Is parking available?
parking.answer: Yes, we have parking available near the venue. The cost is $20,000 COP and space is limited. We recommend arriving early.

needHelp.title: NEED MORE HELP?
needHelp.description: Our team is ready to answer all your questions. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
